permissions: Admins can create prediction subject gaps. Non-admins can create gaps when they are members of the prediction subject.
validation_notes: --prediction-subject is required. --gap-type is required and must be one of: actual_vs_walk_away, actual_vs_consensus, walk_away_vs_consensus. --status, if provided, must be one of: pending, approved. prediction_subject_id must be unique per gap_type. Creation validates prediction subject prerequisites based on gap_type: actual_vs_walk_away requires subject kind lowest_losing_bid, actual value, and walk away amount; actual_vs_consensus requires actual value and consensus prediction; walk_away_vs_consensus requires subject kind lowest_losing_bid, walk away amount, and consensus prediction.

flags.name: --gap-type
flags.description: Gap type (actual_vs_walk_away, actual_vs_consensus, walk_away_vs_consensus). Example: --gap-type actual_vs_consensus
